ai-atk-s0403a38:1_0: Then he taught the five kinds of sensual stimulation to remain.
ai-atk-s0403a38:2_0: The Visākha are running errands and messages for the Nuns
ai-atk-s0403a38:3_0: The Book of the Sixes is finished.
ai-atk-s0403a38:4_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
